DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To compare amount substance P serum sample patient cancer treat busulfan/cyclophosphamide cyclophosphamide/total body irradiation conditioning regimens prior undergo allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation . Secondary - To assess change substance P time see optimal time show physiologic correlate discontinue substance P blockade chemotherapy regimen complete patient . OUTLINE : Previously collect serum sample analyze enzyme immunoassay change substance P level . Patients ' medical record review demographic information , past history , course treatment .
